newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Dain Bosworth initiates three.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Dain Bosworth initiates three.

text.p: - Dain Bosworth initiated coverage of PriceCostco Inc with a buy rating on increasing sales momentum and rising gross margins, analyst Diane Daggatt said.
- The brokerage initiated coverage of Boston Beer Co Inc with a hold rating because of the industry's uncertain risk-reward picture, she said.
- The brokerage also initiated coverage of Garden Botanika Inc with a hold, citing weak comparable-store sales.
